casebody.data:
Daniel Van Buskirk, Respondent, v. Henry R. Cudlipp, Appellant. Decided May 2, 1887. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on verdict for plaintiff as .directed by court. William E. Glover, for appellant. Edward *559C. Ripley, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and O’Gorman, J.

Opinion by Sedgwick, Ch. J.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
